7 Wonders

Capital: Paris
Largest City: Paris
National Language: French
Total Area: 643,801 km²
Currency: Euro

France, officially the French Republic, is a country primarily located in Western Europe. It includes overseas regions and territories and is one of the oldest and most influential countries in the world, known for its culture, cuisine, and history...

The Great Pyramid of Giza is the oldest and largest of the three pyramids in the Giza pyramid complex of Egypt. It is the only one of the Seven Wonders of the Ancient World still in existence. Built as a tomb for the Egyptian Pharaoh Khufu, it is an extraordinary feat of engineering and architecture.

Capital: Rome
Largest City: Rome
National Language: Italian
Total Area: 301,340 km²
Currency: Euro

Italy is a country located in Southern Europe. It is known for its long Mediterranean coastline, rich history, and contributions to art, architecture, and culture. Its capital, Rome, is home to the Vatican as well as landmark art and ruins...

The Lighthouse of Alexandria, also known as the Pharos of Alexandria, was one of the Seven Wonders of the Ancient World. Built by the Ptolemaic Kingdom between 280 and 247 BC on the island of Pharos, it helped guide sailors safely into the busy harbor of Alexandria, Egypt.

The Louvre Museum in Paris, France, is the world\'s largest art museum and a historic monument. It is home to thousands of works of art, including the Mona Lisa, and attracts millions of visitors each year.

Lionel Messi is an Argentine professional footballer who plays as a forward. He is often considered the best player in the world and one of the greatest players of all time. Messi has won a record number of Ballon d\'Or awards and spent the majority of his career at FC Barcelona.
The Metropolitan Museum of Art in New York City is one of the largest and most prestigious museums in the world. It contains over two million works, ranging from classical antiquity to modern art.

Cristiano Ronaldo is a Portuguese professional footballer who plays as a forward. Widely regarded as one of the greatest football players of all time, Ronaldo has won numerous accolades including multiple Ballon d\'Or awards and Champions League titles. He has played for clubs such as Manchester United, Real Madrid, and Juventus.

Son Heung-min is a South Korean professional footballer who plays as a forward. He is known for his speed, finishing, and work ethic. Son is one of Asia\'s most successful footballers and currently plays for Tottenham Hotspur in the English Premier League.

The Taj Mahal, located in Agra, India, is a white marble mausoleum built by Mughal emperor Shah Jahan in memory of his wife Mumtaz Mahal. It is an outstanding example of Mughal architecture and is considered one of the most beautiful buildings in the world. It is a UNESCO World Heritage Site and attracts millions of visitors each year.

Capital : London
Largest City : London
National Language : English
Total Area : 242,495 km2
Currency : GBP

The United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland, commonly known as the United Kingdom (UK) or Britain, is a country in Northwestern Europe, off the coast of the continental mainland. It comprises England, Scotland, Wales, and Northern Ireland. The UK includes the island of Great Britain, the north-eastern part of the island of Ireland, and most of the smaller islands within the British Isles, covering 94,354 square miles (244,376 km²). Northern Ireland shares a land border with the Republic of Ireland; otherwise, the United Kingdom is surrounded by the Atlantic Ocean, the North Sea, the English Channel, the Celtic Sea, and the Irish Sea. The UK maintains sovereignty over the British Overseas Territories...

The Vatican Museums, located in Vatican City, display works from the vast collection amassed by the Roman Catholic Church. They include the famous Sistine Chapel, painted by Michelangelo, and are among the most visited museums in the world.
